snippet: Critics say that federal agencies for preventing and putting out wildfires are underfunded - especially given climate projections suggesting a rise in wildfires over the next 20 years.
abstract: Critics say that federal agencies for preventing and putting out wildfires are underfunded - especially given climate projections suggesting a rise in wildfires over the next 20 years.

headline.main: On Our Radar: Cuts in the Firefighting Budget
